alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 02 at 4:10PM AKDT until November 03 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Anchorage hillside. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will continue tonight and gradually diminish through the morning on Thursday. The heaviest snowfall amounts of around 7 to 10 inches are expected on the upper hillside, with lower amounts of 4 to 6 inches expected across the Anchorage bowl.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
